Smite.NAME: Smite
Smite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal 50% more.
Smite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal twice as much.

EmpoweringForce.NAME: Empowering Force
EmpoweringForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade up to !M! card in your hand.
EmpoweringForce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade up to !M! cards in your hand.

RecklessSmite.NAME: Reckless Smite
RecklessSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! vulnerable. NL If the enemy is weak, deal 50% more.
RecklessSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! vulnerable. NL If the enemy is weak, deal twice as much.

MercilessSmite.NAME: Merciless Smite
MercilessSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Smite card in your hand. If the enemy is weak, deal 50% more
MercilessSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Smite card in your hand. If the enemy is weak, deal twice as much

Decimate.NAME: Decimate
Decimate.DESCRIPTION: If you have !M!% HP or more, deal !D! damage.

PowerStrike.NAME: Power Strike
PowerStrike.DESCRIPTION: For each [R] you have, deal !M! damage.

WideSmite.NAME: Wide Smite
WideSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Each weakened enemy is dealt 50% more.
WideSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Each weakened enemy is dealt twice as much.

CombatDance.NAME: Combat Dance
CombatDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [R]. NL Lose 8HP.

ToweringCharge.NAME: Towering Charge
ToweringCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If, after playing this card, you have 2 or more MP, apply !M! Weak.

GracefulSiphon.NAME: Graceful Siphon
GracefulSiphon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Heal !M! HP. Exhaust.

ZealousSmite.NAME: Zealous Smite
ZealousSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal 50% more, gain [R] and draw a card.
ZealousSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal twice as much, gain [R] and draw a card.

TearSoul.NAME: Tear Soul
TearSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn, start with [R] [R] LESS.
TearSoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn, start with [R] LESS.

BreakThrough.NAME: Break Through
BreakThrough.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable. Exhaust.

Uprising.NAME: Uprising
Uprising.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

Chainer.NAME: Chainer
Chainer.DESCRIPTION: For each 10 HP you have, deal !M! Damage.

FuriousSmite.NAME: Furious Smite
FuriousSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL If the enemy is weak, deal 50% more.
FuriousSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL If the enemy is weak, deal twice as much.

AuraDischarge.NAME: Aura Discharge
AuraDischarge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies NL Heal !M! HP. Exhaust.

Desperation.NAME: Desperation
Desperation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable.

AbandonReason.NAME: Abandon Reason
AbandonReason.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each 10 points of HP you lost. Deal !D! damage.

Retaliate.NAME: Retaliate
Retaliate.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you lost life this turn. Deal !D! damage.

StrainingSmite.NAME: Straining Smite
StrainingSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal 50% more. NL Add a Burn to your hand.
StrainingSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal twice as much. NL Add a Burn to your hand.

AlmightySmite.NAME: Almighty Smite
AlmightySmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal 50% more.
AlmightySmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is weak, deal twice as much.

PowerStance.NAME: Power Stance
PowerStance.DESCRIPTION: For each [R] you have, gain !M! Block.

TakeAim.NAME: Take Aim
TakeAim.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It costs 1 less this turn. Exhaust.
TakeAim.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It costs 1 less this turn.

MightBracer.NAME: Might Bracer
MightBracer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust the top card of your deck

ItsSmitingTime.NAME: It's Smitin' Time!
ItsSmitingTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! for each Smite card in your hand.

ZealousPersecution.NAME: Zealous Persecution
ZealousPersecution.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have a card in your hand that costs 3 or more. NL Draw !M! cards. Lose 6 life.

SeekAnswers.NAME: Seek Answers
SeekAnswers.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If it costs !M! Or more, gain [R]
